mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_ENGUAACCBSINFSGMT set BUSILINES = #{BusiLines,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSIDTILLINES = #{BusiDtilLines,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENDATE = #{OpenDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GUARAMT = #{GuarAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CY = #{Cy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUEDATE = #{DueDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GUARMODE = #{GuarMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OTHREPYGUARWAY = #{OthRepyGuarWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECDEP = #{SecDep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTRCTTXTCODE = #{CtrctTxtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ReportFlag=#{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAGRAPHDEL = #{ParagraphDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GUARACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{GuarAcctBsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select GUARACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO, BUSILINES, BUSIDTILLINES, OPENDATE, GUARAMT, CY, DUEDATE, GUARMODE, OTHREPYGUARWAY, SECDEP, CTRCTTXTCODE,ReportFlag,PARAGRAPHDEL from PBCRS_REPORT_ENGUAACCBSINFSGMT where GUARACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{GuarAcctBsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select GUARACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO, BUSILINES, BUSIDTILLINES, OPENDATE, GUARAMT, CY, DUEDATE, GUARMODE, OTHREPYGUARWAY, SECDEP, CTRCTTXTCODE,ReportFlag from PBCRS_REPORT_ENGUAACCBSINFSGMT

select info.* from PBCRS_REPORT_ENGUAACCBSINFSGMT info,pbcrs_report_EnSecAcctInf where info.GuarAcctBsInfSgmtSeqNo = pbcrs_report_EnSecAcctInf.GuarAcctBsInfSgmtSeqNo and pbcrs_report_EnSecAcctInf.EnSecAcctInfSeqNo= #{EnSecAcctInfSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
